mapper.select: SELECT address_id, user_id, recipient, phone, CONCAT(province, city, district, detail) as full_address, create_time FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT address_id, user_id, recipient, phone, CONCAT(province, city, district, detail) as full_address, create_time FROM address WHERE address_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (user_id, recipient, phone, province, city, district, detail) VALUES (#{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name}, #{tel}, '默认省份', '默认城市', '默认区县', #{address})
